rules: Use 'tracking-tight' for all headings larger than 24px.
Headings must be Slate-900 (Dark), never pure black.
Body text should be Slate-600 or Slate-700 for optimal readability against white.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on pink/blue backgrounds is White or Slate-900. Never use grey text on colored backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE /app/frontend/src/index.css with the CSS variables provided in 'colors.css_variables.light'.
3. USE the 'Manrope' and 'Figtree' fonts. Import them via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
4. IMPLEMENT the 'Glassmorphism' style for the Chat Interface to make it feel modern.
5. ENSURE all text is in Slovak language as per requirements.
6. DO NOT use the default Shadcn radius (0.5rem). Override it to '1rem' (rounded-2xl) for a softer look.
7. USE the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
8. CREATE a 'Layout' component that handles the sidebar/navigation for different roles (Admin/Teacher/Student).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
